      • implode

        public static String implode(Collection<?> collection)
        Implodes the specified collection using a comma separator. The array elements are stringified using their toString() method.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to implode
        Returns:
        The imploded collection

      • implode

        public static String implode(Collection<?> collection,
             String separator)
        Implodes the specified array using the specified separator. The array elements are stringified using their toString() method.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to implode
        separator - The separator
        Returns:
        The imploded collection

      • implode

        public static String implode(Collection<?> collection,
             Stringifier stringifier,
             Object... options)
        Implodes the specified collection using the specified Stringifier and using a comma separator. If the array is null or empty, an empty String ( StringUtil#E) is returned.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to implode
        stringifier - The Stringifier to be used for each of the array's elements.
        separator - The separator between the stringified elements
        options - Extra arguments, passed on to Converter.execute(Object, Object...)
        Returns:
        The imploded collection

      • implode

        public static String implode(Collection<?> collection,
             String sep,
             Stringifier stringifier,
             Object... options)
        Implodes the specified collection using the specified separator and Stringifier. If the array is null or empty, an empty String ( StringUtil#E) is returned.
        Parameters:
        objects - The collection to implode
        stringifier - The Stringifier to be used for each of the array's elements.
        sep - The separator between the stringified elements
        options - Extra arguments, passed on to Converter.execute(Object, Object...)
        Returns:
        The imploded collection
